abstract: Brian T. Moynihan, the chief executive of Bank of America, had barely begun his speech to analysts and investors at the Citi Financial Services conference when hecklers interrupted.
snippet: Brian T. Moynihan, the chief executive of Bank of America, had barely begun his speech to analysts and investors at the Citi Financial Services conference when hecklers interrupted.
lead_paragraph: Whoever said investors conferences weren’t full of surprises?

headline.main: Protesters Heckle Bank of America Chief

abstract: Cerberus is said to be in discussions to acquire a majority stake in Yellow Pages division of AT&T in a deal that would value the unit at about $1.5 billion.
snippet: Cerberus is said to be in discussions to acquire a majority stake in Yellow Pages division of AT&T in a deal that would value the unit at about $1.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: The private equity firm Cerberus Capital Management is known for buying businesses that others have left for dead. Its latest potential deal would only burnish that reputation.

headline.main: Cerberus Said to Be in Talks to Acquire AT&T’s Yellow Pages
